|brand = Edgewater Networks |model = EdgeMarc 4562 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = T4W |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AG108 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, analog phone gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = NKRCM9 |icid = 5318A-4500 |us_id = EWRDY01B4500 |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;IXP425;PRIXP425ABD; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = XScale |cpu1spd = 533 <!-- 266 / 400 / 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;JS28F128J3D75; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Mira;P2V56S40BTP-G6; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;IP101A; |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8305SC; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:03:6D, |oui = 00:0B:6B,
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RedBoot;2.02;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (9600 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, CON4
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = T1/E1 Interface, analog phone port, RTC w/ battery, fan, metal case, |addchip = 2-Wire RTC;Xicor;X1205;;1;,,, Phone Line Monitor IC;IXYSIC;CPC5710N;;6;,,, SOIC Phone Line Interface;IXYS;CPC5622A;;6;,,, Low EMI Clock Generator;Renesas;MK1707;;1;,,, 5A Adjustable LDO Linear Regulator;Niko-Sem;L1084;;1;,,, USB 2.0/MS Combo Interface Host Controller;nVidia;M5273;;1;,,, Voice and InterNet Telephony Interface Circuit;Infineon;PEB 3324;;2;,,, Ringing SLIC with Integrated DC/DC Converter;Infineon;PEF 4268F;;2;,,, 3A, 23V Step-Down Converter;Monolithic Power Systems;MP1583DN;;3;,,, Octal Transparent D-Type Latches w/ 3-State Output;TI;SN74LV373A;;1;,,, 1A Fixed and Adjustable LDO Linear Regulator;Niko-Sem;L1117;;7;,,, Low-Power, Low-Offset Voltage,Dual Comparator;TI;LM393;;16;,,, Octal D-Type Flip Flop w/ 3-State Output;Philips;74ACH574;;1;,,, Octal Bus Transceiver w/ 3-State Output;NXP;74LVC244A;;1;,,, High Voltage Ringing SLIC Protector;Bourns;TISP61089B;;2;,,, 3-to-8 Line Decoder/Demultiplexer;NXP;74LVC138A;;1;,,, 3-State Quad Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;74LVC125A;;3;,,, Hex Inverting Schmitt Trigger;NXP;74AHC14;;1;,,, 3.3V Zero Delay Buffer;Cypress;CY2305S;;1;,,, Quad 2-Input AND Gate;NXP;74AHC08;;1;,,, Quad 2-Input OR Gate;NXP;74LVC32A;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Zywyn;ZT3243;;1; ,,, |802dot11_protocols = abg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = default |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Runtop |manuf_model = GVR6202 |manuf_rev = IV |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/15/2004 |estreldate = 02/2007 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Wistron NeWeb CM9 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR5213A; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR5112A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"A/N:GPCVR6202-000-IV301", "P/N:GVR6202 Rev.IV" and :"START:2007/02/09" are silkscreened on base board.
*"A/N:GPCVI4461-TED-IV300, "P/N:GVI4461 Rev.IV" and :"START:2006/11/10" are silkscreened on T1 daughter board.
*"A/N:GPCVM1500-FOD-IV300, "P/N:GVM1500 Rev.IV" and :"START:2007/05/11" are silkscreened on SLIC daughter board.
Device has 4x T1/E1 RJ-45 interfaces and 8x RJ11 SLIC interfaces. {{See also|Edgewater}}
==Links of Interest== *[ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/EdgeMarc/4500/4562T4W%20Quick%20Start%20Guide.pdf Quick Start Guide]
